00011 unsigned int Except::Base::gBacktraceSymbols = 5;

00013 Except::Base::Base() {
00014   fTrace[0] = 0;
00015   fWhat[0] = 0;
00016 #ifdef _GNU_SOURCE
00017   if (gBacktraceSymbols>0) {
00018     const unsigned int bufferSize=100;
00019     if (gBacktraceSymbols>bufferSize) gBacktraceSymbols = bufferSize;
00020     void *buffer[bufferSize];
00021     unsigned int frames = bufferSize;
00022     if (gBacktraceSymbols<frames) frames = gBacktraceSymbols;
00023     int nFrames = backtrace(buffer,frames);
00024     char **symbols = backtrace_symbols(buffer,nFrames);
00025     if (symbols != NULL) {
00026       unsigned int len = 0;
00027       std::strcat(fTrace,"Backtrace:\n");
00028       for (int i = 0; i<nFrames; ++i) {
00029         std::string sym(symbols[i]);
00030         std::string lib;
00031         std::string::size_type s = sym.find_last_of('/');
00032         if (s != std::string::npos) sym = sym.substr(s+1);
00033         s = sym.find_first_of('(');
00034         if (s != std::string::npos) lib = sym.substr(0,s);
00035         sym = sym.substr(s+1);
00036         std::string::size_type t = sym.find_first_of(')');
00037         if (s != std::string::npos
00038             && t != std::string::npos) sym = sym.substr(0,t);
00039         else sym="";
00040         if (lib.empty() && sym.empty()) continue;
00041         len += lib.length();
00042         len += sym.length() + 6;
00043         if (2*len>sizeof(fTrace)) break;
00044         std::strcat(fTrace," --> ");
00045         if (!lib.empty()) std::strcat(fTrace,lib.c_str());
00046         if (!sym.empty()) {
00047           std::strcat(fTrace,": ");
00048           std::strcat(fTrace,sym.c_str());
00049         }
00050         std::strcat(fTrace,"\n");
00051       }
00052       std::free(symbols);
00053     }
00054   }
00055 #endif
00056   std::strcat(fWhat,"Except::Base");
00057 }

00059 void Except::Base::AppendWhat(const char* child) {
00060   unsigned int wLen = std::strlen(fWhat);
00061   unsigned int cLen = std::strlen(child);
00062   if (wLen+cLen < sizeof(fWhat)-5) {
00063     std::strcat(fWhat,"::");
00064     std::strcat(fWhat,child);
00065   }
00066 }

00068 void Except::Base::AppendWhat(const char* child, const char* message) {
00069   AppendWhat(child);
00070   unsigned int wLen = std::strlen(fWhat);
00071   unsigned int mLen = std::strlen(message);
00072   if (wLen+mLen < sizeof(fWhat)-9) {
00073     std::strcat(fWhat,"  \"");
00074     std::strcat(fWhat,message);
00075     std::strcat(fWhat,"\"");
00076   }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void Except::Base::AppendWhat(const char* child, const char* file, int line) {
00080   AppendWhat (child);
00081   unsigned int wLen = std::strlen(fWhat);
00082   unsigned int fLen = std::strlen(file);
00083   if (fLen+wLen < sizeof(fWhat)-16) {
00084     char buf[16];
00085     buf[0]=0;
00086     snprintf(buf,16,":%d)", line);
00087     std::strcat(fWhat," (");
00088     std::strcat(fWhat,file);
00089     std::strcat(fWhat,buf);
00090   }
